description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for llm-d inference server with all Tier 1 and Tier 2 metrics

panels.description: Overall platform-wide error rate across all models
panels.title: Overall Error Rate

panels.description: Error rate broken down by model name
panels.title: Per-Model Error Rate

panels.description: Number of request preemptions per vLLM instance (indicates resource contention)
panels.title: Request Preemptions

panels.description: P50, P90, and P99 overall request latency across all models
panels.title: Overall Latency P50/P90/P99

panels.description: P99 Time to First Token latency by model (measures how long until response starts)
panels.title: Model-Specific TTFT P99

panels.description: P99 Time per Output Token by model (measures generation speed)
panels.title: Model-Specific TPT P99

panels.description: Scheduler uptime and health indicator
panels.title: Scheduler Health

panels.description: Average GPU utilization across all GPUs
panels.title: GPU Utilization

panels.description: Request rate (QPS) by model
panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: P99 end-to-end latency through the EPP scheduler
panels.title: EPP E2E Latency P99

panels.description: P99 plugin processing latency by plugin type
panels.title: Plugin Processing Latency

panels.description: KV cache utilization percentage by pod and model
panels.title: KV Cache Utilization

panels.description: Number of requests waiting in queue by pod and model
panels.title: Request Queue Lengths

panels.description: Total token throughput (prompt + generation tokens) per second by model and pod
panels.title: Model Throughput

panels.description: Generation token rate per second by model and pod
panels.title: Generation Token Rate

panels.description: Average number of running requests per pod (queue utilization)
panels.title: Queue Utilization

panels.description: Request distribution (QPS) per vLLM instance
panels.title: Request Distribution

panels.description: Token distribution (tokens/sec) per vLLM instance
panels.title: Token Distribution

panels.description: Percentage of time GPUs are idle (not processing tokens)
panels.title: Idle GPU Time

panels.description: P99 latency for routing decision by scheduler plugin
panels.title: Routing Decision Latency

panels.description: Overall prefix cache hit rate across all instances
panels.title: Prefix Cache Hit Rate

panels.description: Prefix cache hit rate by individual vLLM instance
panels.title: Per-Instance Hit Rate

panels.description: Cache utilization percentage by pod and model
panels.title: Cache Utilization

panels.description: Average number of running requests on prefill workers
panels.title: Prefill Worker Utilization

panels.description: KV cache usage percentage on decode workers
panels.title: Decode Worker Utilization

panels.description: Number of requests waiting in prefill worker queues
panels.title: Prefill Queue Length

title: llm-d Extended Monitoring
